column2: our waiter brought us complimentary desserts because it was our first time at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba
column3: but I pretended it was because it was my birthday. There was no way I was going to turn down free desserts
column4: even if I was very full from all of the abovementioned food. The coconut flan was the best. Simply The Best I Have Ever Had. I would make the trip back *just* for that flan. The other dessert was caramelized banana with vanilla ice cream
column6: and toasted pistachios. The presentation was cute and it was quite delicious
column7: though perhaps a bit too sweet with the quince syrup.
